TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReplicatorActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity
Public NotInheritable Class ReplicatorActivity Inherits CompositeActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 執行子活動的多個執行個體。

span.span: Runs multiple instances of a child activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 與程式碼中的 `for each` 陳述式類似。The is similar to a `for each` statement in code. 如果您的工作是在許多不同的實體上重複相同的函式，則 是比 更好的解決方案。If you are presented with a task in which you repeat the same function on many different entities, may be a better solution than . 根據預設，當所有子執行個體完成時， 即完成。By default, a is completed when all child instances have completed. 您可以使用活動完成時使用的自訂條件來覆寫這個行為。You can override this behavior with a custom condition to use when the activity finishes. 如果在所有子執行個體完成前，這個條件是評估為 `true`，則任何執行中的未完成子執行個體將被取消。If this condition evaluates to `true` before all child instances have completed, then any running incomplete child instances are canceled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體，並定義 事件的處理常式。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class and define a handler for the event. 這個程式碼範例是 SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜複寫器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Replicator SDK Sample from the SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用複寫器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)。For more information, see [Using Replicator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性讓 寫入器能夠輕鬆的取得這個資訊，而不必維護其本身的集合或評估動態活動集。This property allows the writer an easy way to get this information without having to maintain their own collection or evaluate over a dynamic activity set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ChildInitialized As EventHandler(Of ReplicatorChildEventArgs)

summary.span: 緊接在子活動初始化之後發生。

span.span: Occurs immediately after a child activity is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有訂閱這個事件，每次為 `Children` 集合中的項目建立子活動的執行個體時，即引發這個事件。If subscribed to, this event is raised every time that an instance of the child activity is created for an item in the `Children` collection. `Children` 集合是透過 事件處理常式的 完成設定。The `Children` collection is set through the of the event handler. 子 執行個體會透過該呼叫傳遞，如此 便能夠在該子執行個體上設定值。The child instance is passed in the call so that the can set values on the child. 集合中的相關 `Children` 物件也會跟著傳遞。The relevant object from the `Children` collection is also passed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定 事件的值。The following code example shows how to set the value of the event. 這個程式碼範例是 SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜複寫器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Replicator SDK sample from the SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用複寫器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)。For more information, see [Using Replicator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858). summary.span: 取得執行中子活動執行個體的陣列。

span.span: Gets an array of running child activity instances.

value.span: 目前執行中子活動執行個體的陣列。

span.span: An array of currently running child activity instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性傳回的活動執行個體是活動型別的執行個體，這些執行個體包含在 之內。The activity instances returned by this property are the instances of the activity type that are contained within the . 如果 在序列模式中執行，則陣列包含不超過一個的活動；如果在平行模式中執行，則陣列包含所有目前正在執行的執行個體。If the is running in sequence mode, the array contains no more than one activity; if running in parallel mode the array contains all instances that are currently running.

public: property System::Workflow::ComponentModel::ActivityCondition ^ UntilCondition { System::Workflow::ComponentModel::ActivityCondition ^ get(); void set(System::Workflow::ComponentModel::ActivityCondition ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定完整條件，指出何時應完成 。

span.span: Gets or sets a completion condition that indicates when the should finish.
An that determines whether the is finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個預設條件是要完成之 的所有子執行個體都必須完成。This default condition is that all child instances must complete for the to be completed. 如同 ，您可以使用規則條件或程式碼條件指定完整條件。As with a , you can specify the completion condition using a rule condition or code condition. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 屬性的值設定為 `null`，這表示 `ReplicatorActivity` 永遠不會關閉。The following code example shows how to set the value of the property to `null`, which means the `ReplicatorActivity` never closes. 這個程式碼範例是 SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs 檔案中＜複寫器 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Replicator SDK Sample from the SimpleReplicatorWorkflow.Designer.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用複寫器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)。For more information, see [Using Replicator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858).
